phrases: It appears that you are the last one.
Damn it!
You damn brats...
Who do you think you are?!
Dust Cyclone!
Flamethrower!
Combo Attack!
Telekinetic Pillar of Flame!
Do not underestimate me!
This is nothing
Good job, you two.
You have gotten stronger.
We have been practicing every day.
It is all thanks to your guidance, Teru-san.
Thank you for helping us, Takeuchi-san.
No need to thank me.
I left the organization as well.
I acted like I betrayed you so we could pull off a splendid surprise attack.
You better be grateful for me and my peerless wit.
What?
H-Huh?
I cannot move...
Kaito-kun.
Lie-Detection Telepathy!
It is okay.
He has not betrayed us yet.
What do you mean, yet?!
So what are we going to do now?
Reigen-san said we did not have to fight,
but I disagree.
We are going to take our city back.
(Get ready, wake your psyche up, MOB!)
(Get ready, dig your anger up, MOB!)
(Get ready, wake your psyche up, MOB!)
(Get ready!)
Coming down, could you fill your satisfaction?
You are a MOB.
Cannot you feel your own frustration?
Coming down, could you fill your satisfaction?
You are a MOB.
What do you want to be?
Wear your overflowing emotions on your sleeve and break it down.
What do you see once you go beyond your limits?
The mysterious percentage.
Cryin' my life, cryin' my psyche,
cryin' my heart in such commonplaces!
Is that your ideal?
Is that your mind?
It all begins when it hits 100.
The MOB is alive.
The MOB is high.
The MOB is staying frustrated, are not you?
Is that your ideal?
Is that your mind?
Right now...
Your life is your own.
(Get ready, wake your psyche up, MOB!)
Mob Psycho
(Get ready, dig your anger up, MOB!)
(Get ready, wake your psyche up, MOB!)
(Get ready!)
Guidance Psychic Sensor
You pathetic dogs...
You have forgotten how terrifying your owner can be because I left you alone for a bit.
Sho is here.
Okay, let us go.
Say, Ritsu.
Why are you being so cooperative?
Because your situation was not completely unrelatable.
There are times when I worry what did happen if Nii-san went berserk with his powers.
And Suzuki, your father is going berserk right now.
You are the only one who can stop him.
Yeah!
I will show you that I can finish this!
There you are,
Shimazaki!
I can tell at a glance...
He is really strong!
He is a teleporter that can read his enemy's movements.
First, I will
You go on ahead.
I will keep him occupied.
You cannot deal with him alone.
He is one of the strongest in the whole organization.
And that is exactly why.
In return, promise me that you will stop your father.
I promise.
I am glad to have you around.
Go!
He got away?
He does not intend to follow Suzuki?
I am over here.
I would appreciate it if you would not resist so much.
I do not exactly like beating on weaklings.
You are just as weak!
Oh?
And who are you comparing me to?
I should have taken him out before it got to this point.
I would just been powerless to do anything but sit back and watch...
This is it for you.
Such a shame.
You managed to get this far...
But now, you have to deal with me.
My dad is using his powers for evil,
but I am going to use my powers to show him what is right!
I am going to end this!
How awful.
Someone used psychic powers to do this?
That is the enemy base.
Reigen and the others should be heading over, too.
Hey, there is still some brat here.
Did he wait too long to run away?
Whoo!
Got us some dinner.
So they are pillaging the area.
I have gone there with Ritsu before.
Return what you took from the store.
Stealing is a crime.
You are supposed to be adults.
Who the hell are you?
This town belongs to us now.
Yo, stop.
You are going to traumatize him.
Stop messing around with your powers.
Do not use them like this.
Stop.
I-Is this kid a natural esper?
Could you guys manufacture this can?
Huh?
Could you actually grow the vegetables in this sandwich?
Could you fix that glass door you just broke?
Could your powers help you hit upon the idea of giving out a freebie for a lucky draw?
The hell are you trying to say?
You guys are making a huge mistake,
thinking you are special just because of your powers.
You should realize that you are only able to survive thanks to the help of others.
You fool!
You can make anyone submit to you as long as you have power!
One last thing...
Do not use your physic powers against others.
If you do not have anyone who can give you that advice,
I will do it.
Holy crap, he is pissed.
I am going to get back.
An attack by the enemy?
Gather everyone up!
Well, well...
Looks like we had quite the stray show up.
Minegishi-san!
I will take him down.
You guys back me up.
These will grow as much as I would like if I give them my power,
and multiply as much as I would like.
You can do it, too?
You do not really like plants, do you?
That is right.
They are merely tools.
Go!
Drop him!
Help Minegishi-san out!
Hit him with your telekinesis!
It is better to bend than break.
You should join our side.
That might be easier, but it is no fun.
You should see the difference in our abilities by now.
You sure you will not change your mind if I hurt you a bit more?
I always wanted to be able to use psychic powers.
But now that I have finally awakened to these powers, I finally understand...
To she would blood, sweat, and tears in order to live a fun life...
What I really wanted was that kind of wholehearted devotion.
I will not let anyone take away my ability to live a fun life!
Guess you might not be a good fit, after all.
In that case, I will just...
Ow...
I managed to land a hit for the first time!
My, my, you are far more resilient than I would imagined.
We need to repay you for what you did earlier.
I guess you are not sewer rats.
You are cockroaches.
We have changed since we were in Claw.
Now that we want independence, we are far more resilient.
The results will not change, no matter how many times you try.
Do not act so tough.
We know you are panicking.
Even if you can read our moves,
you should hit your limit with so many people.
I will be getting my revenge!
Takeuchi!
Tsuchiya!
Not happening!
Are not you going to shoot?
I do not think capture tactics will be of much use.
I told you...
Cleaning
The result will not change, no matter how many of you there are.
Attack more!
The more moves we make,
we can figure out where he will teleport and finish him!
They are far more capable than those people in the division...
Do not stop, Shigeo!
All right!
He is panicking!
Let us hit him some more!
Looks like you are having some trouble.
You are...
I would not mind lending you my support.
Now, go!
It is Matsuo, the evil-spirit user!
He is going to send all kinds of monsters at us!
I would appreciate it if you would not underestimate me...
Matsuo-san!
What is this small bottle?
Talk about bad taste.
N-No, anything but that!
Even I cannot control it!
Do not touch it!
You dumbass!
We have Minegishi-san!
Wh-What?
Why is everyone falling...
What... is that?
Mogami-san!
This is not good.
What is that?
So, after the poison jar, you now want me to devour a horde of espers...
You are such lowly creatures...
Wh-What the hell is that?!
My plants are not listening to me!
Mob Psycho
Winner
Mob Psycho
Wi
Stop!
Why are you trying to stop me?
I have been watching, and none of these insects deserve to live.
There are humans that never change.
But... they might be able to change!
Promise that you will not do anything bad ever again!
I promise...
Spare me...
See?!
What if he is just lying so he can survive?
Are you going to watch over them until they have reformed?
You think you can keep an eye on them forever?
Well... no.
But we need to have faith in one another in order to get through life.
If we cannot do that, we will never get anywhere.
I would expect nothing less from you.
But there are things that cannot be solved with mere kindness.
It is also necessary to be hard on people at times.
If you can do that, you will be invincible, Kageyama Shigeo-kun.
Did Mogami disappear for good this time, or...?
Be hard on people, huh?
I am not very good at that.
I am here now.
Claw is finished!
Sho, there must have been a better way of doing this.
We are family.
What?
Now you want to act like a father?
You never cared about a damn thing I said.
You should have attacked while playing the obedient son.
Do not get in my way any further.
It took me twenty years to get here.
Serves you right!
I have ruined those twenty years for you!
I am just as strong as the Ultimate 5 now!
Fight me, man to man!
Do not make me laugh.
Never look down on your father.
A stupidly powerful barrier that activates when I try to get close...
Is that your true power?
In that case...
Damn it...
He is mocking me!
These techniques are mere child's play.
I thought you would have grown a little more than that.
Oh?
You have learned how to mess with the refraction factor of light?
This is my trump card!
Here is the energy I have saved up over three months...
Charge Bomb!
Hell, yeah!
Justice prevails!
I am so sorry.
I would not have taken a bathroom break if I would known this would happen.
That is fine.
My son's just going through his rebellious phase.
Being a bad boy again?
You will never turn out to be a decent adult like that.
Screw you!
That was three months' worth of energy!
Let us stop fighting and happily take over the world together.
Do not bother.
I can see why Sho would disagree with this.
You fear this plan will fail, do not you?
You do not know the outside world, after all.
The real reason I went around the world
was to see if world domination would actually be realistic.
But ultimately, I could not find a single esper stronger than me in this world.
I have the ultimate power.
And that gives you the right to take over the world?
Did you hear that, Serizawa?
He is totally messed up in the head.
President...
You are so cool.
Absolute idiots are the worst to deal with!
I am impressed with your attack earlier.
The apple really does not fall far from the tree.
Do not lump me in with you!
How am I anything like you?!
You said you were charging up energy for three months?
I have the same ability.
What?!
Did not I tell you?
I spent twenty years preparing for this.
Do not tell me that the last twenty years was not to gather all those troops...
I guess it would not hurt to show you some of my twenty years...
Why not give up already,
you poor souls the boss named the Scars?
Shut it!
You are a goddamn coward that does not have to guts to go against the boss!
The real reason he named you Scars is because you are all failures.
You were marked as damaged goods!
Screw you!
Telekinetic Helix!
As for the basics required of espers...
we are on a entirely different level.
I am saying this for your own good.
You should just give up.
But that manhole cover had some effect, did not it?
Teru-san!
Yeah.
It looks like attacks he did not detect actually work against him.
He is the one who is been cornered here.
You are quite efficient.
Because of that,
I will get rid of you first, once and for all.
Not good.
He is going to destroy him.
What can we do?
I believe it is time to end things.
Next, you will come from behind!
You
It might be convenient to be able to read your opponents' moves,
but that also makes your moves monotonous.
You rely too much on your powers.
Well, this is surprising.
If we disregard the boss, I do have the position as the world's greatest.
There are people in this world with powers you cannot even fathom.
You are just an ordinary man.
Even I could defeat you.
Why y
You are right!
It is when he is distracted!
Nice, Little Bro!
Fifth Punch!
Super Destructive Energy Blast!
I-I need to regain my...
C-Concentrate...
Concentrate.
Concentrate and you will be able to figure everything out.
Everyone here is an esper.
Cut everything else out.
Concentrate.
Concentrate.
Mind's Eye!
Nothing you can do will ever work on me again.
Your injuries, the weaknesses even you are not aware of,
and the fact that you can barely see now...
I can see through everything now.
It is too late to have any regrets.
What is the matter?
Something with tremendous energy is heading this way.
Pretty sure that is my friend.
I guess you finally woke up,
Kageyama-kun.
How amusing.
Let us see whose abilities are greater!
I will face you head-on!
Self-Defense Rush!
One of Reigen's special moves where,
Self-Defense Rush
when he is unsure if it is really self-defense, he yells out self-defense just in case.
Impossible!
I could not sense him at all.
Who is he?!
Reigen-san!
Everyone, get up!
The great master is here.
The great master?
Do not tell me...
There is an esper who can actually make his presence disappear?
What should I do?
Should I withdraw?
Master, he is rather strong.
He is dangerous, so please step back.
Oh, hey, Mob.
That boy from earlier and this unknown esper...
Just how many are there?
Do they have some kind of huge organization?
More importantly, this kid... is on a whole other level.
Yeah, I give up.
I do not stand a chance.
I give.
Well, that was easy.
What happened to taking over the world?
The only one serious about that is the boss.
I do not really care as long as I get to have fun.
As long as you get to have fun?
You disrupted the lives of so many people just for that?
You cannot be serious.
He ran away!
I do not feel like we won at all.
He might attack again.
No, I am pretty sure he is been traumatized.
I think he might have learned his place and turned over a new leaf.
Nii-san.
Ritsu!
Are you okay?
Yeah.
Mom and Dad are somewhere safe, too.
I see.
So it is just like Dimple and Master said.
We sure had one hell of a scare.
Shut up.
Now, then...
I guess all we have left is the last boss.
Hoshino-kun and the others should be getting people to safety right about now.
Let us meet back up with them and attack.
No.
You are all hurt.
I will go alone.
K-Kageyama-kun!
What are you talking about?!
I will go, too!
One of my friends already went in!
No.
This might be hard to hear, but you will just be in my way.
I am sorry.
Being hard on people...
So this is how Shigeo processed what Mogami said to him.
Dimple, I am counting on you.
I know!
I spilled a seed and lost sight of it
I will find it using the color it is dyed in and watch it grow
It immediately returned to the palm of my hand
But it is still too light and too frail to reach for the skies
The world coldly drains away all the heat
The bright sunshine just is not enough
The memories are closing off what lies ahead
Shake off their warmth and set off into the distance
If I let it wither, it would be over just like that
But my hope just does not fade away
You are not scared to do this on your own?
Of course I am scared.
But having someone else get hurt scares me even more.
I am sure I will be able to figure something out.
Crap...
I am trying to take advantage of him while he is still a kid,
but Shigeo's going to become an adult before I know it.
Are you in middle school?
Damn...
You are still a kid.
This is a really bad time.
Would you kindly leave?
Mob finally infiltrates the enemy's base.
Can he get past Serizawa and make it to the boss?
Meanwhile, the boss, who just defeated his son, Sho, shows his true identity.
The Battle for Social Rehabilitation Friendship.
The serious option C involves Blu-rays, manga volumes, and events!
The Battle for Social Rehabilitation Friendship
